docs.title: Honey Trees
docs.text:
REQUIRED

[3] Honey to start with + [HM Fly], [HM Cut], [HM Rock Smash] and [HM Surf]

RECOMMENDED

Honey Gather Pokémon: Combee or Teddiursa [HA], [HM Defog], [Repel]

INTRODUCTION Honey Tree Shiny Hunting Guide

This guide will teach you how to efficiently shiny hunt Honey Trees, which are exclusive to the Sinnoh region.

The route begins in Canalave City and ends near Sunyshore City.

There are 21 Honey Trees in total; however, we recommend skipping the one on Route 221 (near Pal Park), as it’s typically not worth the travel time.

Two Main Methods
  1. Run + Slather – quickly reapplying honey and moving on.
  2. Battle the Pokémon – lead with a Pokémon that knows Honey Gather, or a combo of Frisk + Thief.
Team Shiny Legion [MANY]

By using this guide, you’re assumed to be a member of Team Shiny Legion [MANY].

Need help? Message Kelly or Kole in-game, in the club, or on Discord.

Not a member yet? Mail or whisper Kelly to join or learn more.

Timing
  • Trees take 1 hour to attract Pokémon after applying honey.
Held Items by Pokémon
  • Munchlax
    • Leftovers
  • Combee
    • Honey
  • Cherubi
    • Miracle Seed
  • Wurmple
    • Pecha Berry
    • Bright Powder
Available Pokémon
  • Common
    • Combee
    • Wurmple
  • Uncommon
    • Aipom
    • Burmy
    • Cherubi
  • Rare
    • Cascoon
    • Silcoon
  • Very Rare
    • Heracross
    • Munchlax
🍯 Honey Tree 1

Canalave City → Route 218

  • Fly to Canalave City
  • Go South, then East into Route 218 Gate
  • Find the Honey Tree near the water
🍯 Honey Tree 2

Floaroma Town → Floaroma Meadow

  • Fly to Floaroma Town
  • Go West, then North into Floaroma Meadow
  • Talk to NPC, buy [60] Honey
  • Find the Honey Tree east of the NPC
🍯 Honey Tree 3

Canalave City → Route 218

  • Fly back to Floaroma Town
  • Go East into Route 205
  • Continue East into Valley Windworks
  • Find the Honey Tree on the East side of Valley Windworks
🍯 Honey Tree 4

Canalave City → Route 218

  • Fly to Canalave City
  • Go South, then East into Route 218 Gate
  • Find the Honey Tree near the water
🍯 Honey Tree 5

Canalave City → Route 218

  • Fly to Canalave City
  • Go South, then East into Route 218 Gate
  • Find the Honey Tree near the water
